Class GeneralException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
it.disi.unitn.exceptions.GeneralException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AudioConversionException, InvalidArgumentException, InvalidJSONFileException, RotationFailedException, UnsupportedOperatingSystemException
public abstract class GeneralException extends Exception
Wrapper class to implement exceptions in this library.
